description:
build: increase timeout for ARM
in an effort to make builder freebsd-arm-pi and netbsd-arm-qemu pass again.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

on the netbsd-arm-qemu builder, the "GOMAXPROCS=2 runtime -cpu=1,2,4" test takes
481.767 seconds to finish, so timeout_scale 3 is the minimum required
integral scale for
that test to pass on that builder.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1dc27f043b78 ***

build: increase timeout for ARM
in an effort to make builder freebsd-arm-pi and netbsd-arm-qemu pass again.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7621050

subject: code review 7621050: build: increase timeout for ARM
